nodes.text: A force-detecting chip was a cutting-edge technology that could detect the increased brain wave activity that a individual actively using the Force emitted. The main drawback of the technology was that it could only detect the heightened brain wave activity within twenty meters. This technology's real ability to detect Force-sensitives remained unknown to the only known buyer of the chip: I-5YQ. Den Dhur frustrated with the aforementioned drawbacks of the device smashed it.
